effects: Cure all status effects for all allies
name: Remedy of Hospitality
Remedy of Hospitality
招待萬能藥
만능약 대접
Remède d'hospitalité
Allheilmittel der Gastfreundschaft
Panacea de hospitalidad
desc_short: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies
治療全體隊員的中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痹混亂生病石化狀態
아군 전체에 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복
Soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification pour tous les alliés
Heilt Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein für alle Verb.
Cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie a todos los aliados
